thread.title_full: Head to South London this Aug Bank Holiday to enjoy music extravaganzaTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Head to South London this Aug Bank Holiday to enjoy music extravaganzaTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Head to South London this Aug Bank Holiday to enjoy music extravaganza Published on : Saturday, August 8, 2015
See the cream of the world’s electronic music scene as South West Four sets up once again on Clapham Common in London over the August Bank Holiday Weekend from August 29.
The 2015 line-up sees headline acts from legendary DJs Armin van Buuren, Fatboy Slim, Faithless and Basement Jaxx, to new boys on the block Skrillex and Eric Prydz.
As well as music, SW4 is packed with stalls selling food, drink and festival essentials such as beads and glow sticks.
There’s no campsite at South West Four, so if you have a two-day ticket, you’ll need to arrange accommodation in advance.
With another star studded line-up this year, SW4 continues to prove itself as a highlight of the dance music calendar.
Source: visitlondon.com
